title: HENLEY ON KLIP ( AFRIKAANS ).avi
description:
Henley-on-Klip is'n fiksionele film, gebaseer op die ware gebeure van die bus/trein ongeluk in Januarie 1970, nadat 'n skoolbus op die treinspoor stol. Dit vertel die storie van kinderheld Johan le Roux wat sterf nadat hy twee van sy mede skoliere so lewens red. Drie-en-twintig kinders sterf op die spore te Henley-on-Klip en Ã¢â‚¬Ëœn dorp word in rou gedompel. Henley-on-Klip vertel die verhaal van vriendskap, geloof, ondersteuning en bo alles die besef dat die lewe in 'n oogwink kan verander en die wete dat elke sekonde tel. Afrikaans met Engelse onderskrifte. Henley-on-Klip is a fictional film, based om the true event of the bus/train accident in January 1970, after a school bus stalls on the train tracks. It tells the story of child hero Johan le Roux who dies after he saves two of his fellow schoolmates. Twenty three children die on the tracks at Henley-on-Klip and a town is in morning. Henley-on-Klip tells the story about friendship, belief, support and above all the realization that live can change in an instant and the understanding that every second counts. Afrikaans

Age Restriction: 13PG yrs
Language: Afrikaans
Running Time: 102 mins
